We appreciate your openness regarding your nuclear program. We hope to continue building on our relationship, ensuring mutual prosperity and security. Best regards, White.

As we approach the end of this cycle of international interaction, White encourages all nations to continue advocating for peace, cooperation, and mutual prosperity. It is through our joint commitment to these principles that we can ensure a secure and prosperous world. Let us continue to promote dialogue and mutual understanding. Best regards, White.
